description.value: This is the code has the options seminal vesicle involvement.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

definition.value: Indicates whether the tumour was on the left side of the seminal vesicles
Indicates whether the tumour was on the right side of the seminal vesicles
Indicates whether the tumour was on both sides of the seminal vesicles
